name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetByAwardIdOrSolicitation_V1
description: QE to get Clause set details by Award id or Solicitation id
sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet',
  returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: ri!setId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: ri!solicitationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: ri!awardId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: ri!sort,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "solicitationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!solicitationId,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!solicitationId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "awardId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!awardId,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!awardId)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)
